comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Looks like the lovely Tanis in the middle: www.thepeerage.com/p2758.htm#i27572 Tanis Guinness is one child of Benjamin Guinness, and her brother became Group Captain Thomas Loel Bulkeley Guinness, known as Loel. The elder daughter was Meraud Guinness, later Meraud Guevara a once famous but now forgotten artist: www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,883189,00.html?... So, left to right, T. Loel B. Guinness, Mrs. (Bridget) Guinness, Tanis B. Guinness, Meraud Guinness. More on the interesting Meraud: www.jstor.org/pss/1358865 Meraud's paintings were known for the portrayal of small dogs. which is intersting considering the presence of small dogs in this photo, and associated ones: www.tate.org.uk/servlet/ViewWork?cgroupid=-1&workid=5... And here's Ta Wang once again: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2477621111/in/p...
